title: My Comments on Rebel Wisdom’s Zen & the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance Book Club with Jonathan Rowson
description:
Really nice commentary on RW by Jonathan Rowson. I want to make a few comments and expand on a question Dave Fuller asked him...plus I agree with his the comparison he made with Classic/Romantic worldview's and McGilchrist's work. 

Perspectiva: https://systems-souls-society.com/
Breedlove on Lex: https://youtu.be/HrehEWYj16s?t=12804
Breedlove/Vervaeke: https://youtu.be/237-jbJfleY?t=2310
